script.dialog: This is an important message from the creator of this game.
First, I just want to thank you all for being here.
You have all helped me sculpt this game into the best version that it can possibly be.
The one aspect that always concerned me the most was the |C3|charged attack|C0| system.
I was finally convinced to change it.
So, I'm here to explain what has changed.|L||!|Pay careful attention as you will only see this scene one time!
All charged attacks are now more powerful and have new properties!
But there is also a new |C3|energy bar|C0| to manage.
Your |C3|energy|C0| will drain when you fire a charged attack, but it will also regenerate when you stop charging.
You can still fire charged attacks |C3|without any energy,|C0| but they will be much less powerful.
And the most important thing!|!||L|Breaking any breakable object will instantly |C3|refill some energy!|C0|
Charged attacks are now more aligned to the playstyle that I always envisioned for them.
They feel more special and you must decide when to use them more carefully.
I know these changes might disappoint some of you who are really good at the old system.
I hope you can understand why I had to do this.
I also added |C3|6 control types|C0| for charged attacks that you can mix between in the |C3|Options Menu.|C0|
I want them to be fun for everyone and I don't want anyone to hurt their hands while playing my game.
Thank you for showing love to all these monsters.|L||!|I hope you will continue to do so.
